title: Riot, we need communication
body:
My biggest concern isn't that we might not see the old Harrowing skins again this year, but rather that Riot has been completely silent on the whole issue. It's okay if the answer is no, the vault isn't opening, but please just tell the playerbase what's going on instead of leaving us in the dark like you've been doing so far.

Edit: IT'S BACK

Well... it's happened before.  ECommerce gets deep into a project (like worlds) and forgets the simple things that really keeps fans happy.

For example, Riot used to do a mega "Black Friday" sale.  When Hippalus took over at eCommerce (mid 2012), he completely forgot to set one up that year and caused a huge stink.  His "January mega sale" was pretty weak as well, iirc.

Now that the calendar is uncoupled from the company's updates, I wonder how many other things Riot used to do with regularity are going to go by the wayside (like Decemberween skins).

We profusely apologize for its removal as well as the delay in getting it re-instated.  We'll also be making sure everyone on the moderation team is 100% clear on what belongs where under the new Boards reorganization guidelines.

If you have any comments about this action, please post them in the [other discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/BAys8miK-did-riot-really-just?show=flat) about this in Boards Feedback so as not to derail any further conversation here.
